      public EditableFormattedTextLine​(java.util.List<TextWord> words, java.lang.String textString)

  • Method Details

    • generateCharacterEdges

      public void generateCharacterEdges()
      On creation character edges will not know where the edges of characters in words are. This method generates the edge locations and compiles them into one list used to edit texts.

    • removeDuplicateCharacterEdges

      private void removeDuplicateCharacterEdges()
      generateCharacterEdges may produce multiple character edges with the same offset. This method removes these duplicates to prevent unexpected editing behavior

    • getTextString

      public java.lang.String getTextString()
